import FavoritesContext from '../../store/favorites-context' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import classes from './MainNavigation.module.css'; function MainNavigation(){ const favoritesCtx = useContext(FavoritesContext); return(
react meetups

  • My Favorites {favoritesCtx.totalFavorites}
)}; export default MainNavigation;
